means: [印]现代字体，指印刷中所用的一种字体

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"现代的，当代的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: modern, contemporary, current, recent, present, up-to-date
means: modern ： 指现代或近代，时期可长可短。也可指新颖、时髦的。
contemporary ： 仅指当今这个时代，不涉及任何过去的时代。但可表示不同的人或物存在于同一时代。
current ： 指目前存在和发生的。
recent ： 表示新近的，最近的，时间的长短依据所修饰的人或物而定。
present ： 是这些词中语气最强的一个。指现在正发生、起作用的。
up-to-date ： 一般用于非正式场合，指很时新、能反映当前的最新发展。

sentence.Network_en: We are in one of the most severe recessions in modern times.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们正在经历现代最严重的一段经济衰退。

sentence.Network_en: In many ways, it was a very modern school for its time.
sentence.Network_cn: 从很多方面来说，这所学校在当时是非常先进的。

sentence.Network_en: This boxed collection captures 64 of the greatest modern love songs.
sentence.Network_cn: 这套盒装专辑收录了64首最好听的当代爱情歌曲。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 从现代（Modern）过渡到后现代（Post-modern），两者并无一个明显的分界，后现代的“后”，是指超越现代（当代）事物，行先于现 …
新目标英语八年级下册单词表_百度文库 ... plane 飞机 modern 现代的 kill 杀死.
摩登之路摩登（modern），又译为现代，前者更突出了主动和潮流之意。在文化的立场上说台湾很摩登，是想突出台湾文化的两面性…
在近代（modern），也就是现代，并存二大哲学思潮，一为人本主义，一为科学主义，其中科学主义几乎可等同于实证主义，它又可 …

list.abs: 从现代主义（modernism）到后现代主义（postmodernism）的过程，是二十世纪文化发展和精神流向最重要的趋势，后现代观点影响 …
现代化理论起于20世纪50年代早期政治发展研究，而现代化（modernization）则是一个更早出现的历史现象，它被认为是人类历史发 …
所谓现代性（modernity），其实也是非常简单明了的东西。只要知道了什么是现代，知道了现代化所“化”的那些内容，还不明白什么 …
个人简历英文翻译词汇大全_百度文库 ... mastered 精通的 modernize 使现代化 motivate 促进，激发.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin modernus, from Latin modo 'just now'

encyclopedia.content: modern ['mɔdən] adj. 1. 近代的，现代的 2. 现代化的，时髦的，摩登的；新式的 3. 锛埼难А⒁帐醯蕊級现代派的 4. [常作 M-]锛堄镅燥級近代的，现代的 5. 【印刷】现代体的，现代罗马体的 n. 1. 近代人，现代人 2. 有现代观点的人 3. 现代派画家 4. 【印刷】现代体，现代罗马体，现代式印刷字型

entry.def: Modern means relating to the present time, for example the present decade or present century.

example.ex: ...the problem of materialism in modern society.
example.tran: 现代社会的实利主义问题
所有现代婚姻所面临的危机

entry.tran: 现代化的;新式的;最新的
entry.def: Something that is modern is new and involves the latest ideas or equipment.

example.ex: Modern technology has opened our eyes to many things...
example.tran: 现代科技开阔了我们的眼界，让我们了解了许多事物。

example.ex: In many ways, it was a very modern school for its time...
example.tran: 从很多方面来说，这所学校在当时是非常先进的。

entry.def: People are sometimes described as modern when they have opinions or ways of behaviour that have not yet been accepted by most people in a society.

example.ex: They were very modern Tories in almost every sense...
example.tran: 从几乎所有意义上说，他们都属于非常新潮的保守主义分子。

example.ex: She is  very modern in outlook.

entry.tran: (艺术、舞蹈、音乐、建筑的风格)现代的，近代的
entry.def: Modern is used to describe styles of art, dance, music, and architecture that have developed in recent times, in contrast to classical styles.

means.word_mean: 2. a typeface (based on an 18th century design by Gianbattista Bodoni) distinguished by regular shape and hairline serifs and heavy downstrokes
1. belonging to the modern era; since the Middle Ages;

sentences.sentence: "totem poles are modern rather than prehistoric"

means.word_mean: 2. relating to a recently developed fashion or style;

sentences.sentence: "their offices are in a modern skyscraper"

means.word_mean: 3. characteristic of present-day art and music and literature and architecture

auth_sentence.content: This is a scenario familiar in the modern world.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a scenario familiar in the modern world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a scenario familiar in the modern world.

auth_sentence.content: Can someone in the modern world deny that possibility?
auth_sentence.res_content: Can someone in the modern world deny that possibility?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Can someone in the modern world deny that possibility?

auth_sentence.content: Turn On the Bright Lights is a modern classic.
auth_sentence.res_content: Turn On the Bright Lights is a modern classic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Turn On the Bright Lights is a modern classic.

stems_affixes.word_buile: mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ern..方向的→最近式样
mod量度,方式,模式,风度+est→做事有规矩→礼貌的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有节制的,中等的,适度的,温和的,稳健的
stems_affixes.word_buile: moder=mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ate……的→做事有分度→适度的
out出+mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ed……的→出了时髦[moded时髦的]→不时髦的
modest[adj.谦虚的,有节制的]+y状态→n.谦逊;端庄;羞怯

stems_affixes.value_cn: 模数, 模块, 登月舱, 指令舱
stems_affixes.word_buile: mod模式+ule小→n.模数, 模块, 登月舱, 指令舱
com共同+mod模式+ity表名词→有共同的模式物品→商品
mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ulate=ate表动词→对模式进行调整→调整

stems_affixes.value_cn: 向……提供住处;对……予以照顾性考虑;符合
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac加强+com共同+mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ate表动词→方式相同→符合
mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ify……化→规范化→修改
re再+mod量度,方式,模式,风度+el→再造模型→重建

Sentence.sentence: In modern western societies, however, the focus on individuality and independence means that people are less concerned about conforming to (遵守) the dictates of family and culture.
With the opening of Alfie's in April, and others such as The Pawn, two years ago, modern British food has made its way to Hong Kong.
Chefs agree that diners in Hong Kong are embracing the modern British trend
Personally I can't quite see the meaning in his modern works.
He is not quite impressed with modern paintings
It is no longer important in modern times.

sentences.en: He was steeped in modern history.
sentences.cn: 他埋头于近代史的研究。

means.word_mean: 新式的, 时髦的, 最新的

sentences.en: He has modern ideas in spite of his great age.
sentences.cn: 尽管他年事很高, 但思想观念却很入时。

sentences.en: The dress is the most modern.

means.word_mean: 当代风格的, 现代派的

sentences.en: They went to an exhibition of modern art yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天, 他们参观了现代美术展览。

jushi.english: The modern office block sticks out like a sore thumb among the old buildings in the area.
jushi.chinese: 那座现代化的办公大楼直挺挺地矗立在那片旧建筑物群中十分显眼。

jushi.english: He was steeped in modern history.
jushi.chinese: 他埋头于现代史的研究。
